metadata.title: CVE-2009-3584 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: SQL-Ledger 2.8.24 does not set the secure flag for the session cookie in anhttps session, which makes it easier for remote attackers to capture thiscookie by intercepting its transmission within an http session.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
